content: this legal case involves two parties who are in a dispute over the coownership of a residential property the case was first heard in the municipal court of rijeka on january 27 2017 and then in the county court of varaždin on april 4 2018 currently the case is in the cost procedure stage the firstinstance court received a proposal to dissolve the coownership and divide the property through a public auction or another suitable method after considering expert opinions and evidence the court decided to dissolve the coownership through civil division however the opposing party raised objections about the fairness of the proceedings the accuracy of the factual situation and the value of the property they also introduced new facts for the first time in their appeal which they are authorized to do according to the civil procedure act
